meanings.sent1: She determines the winner of the game by counting the points.
meanings.sent2: The judge determines the sentence for the crime.
meanings.sent3: He determines the best ice cream flavor by tasting them all.
meanings.sent4: The compass determines the direction we should go.
meanings.sent5: Her smile determines the mood of the room.

meanings.definition: To fix or settle the boundaries or limits of
meanings.sent1: The surveyor determines the property lines with precision.
meanings.sent2: The rules determine how far players can move on the board.
meanings.sent3: The fence determines where the garden ends and the yard begins.
meanings.sent4: The treaty determines the borders between the two countries.
meanings.sent5: The map determines the exact location of the hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: To ascertain definitely; find out definitely
meanings.sent1: The scientist determines the chemical composition of the substance.
meanings.sent2: The detective determines the identity of the suspect through fingerprints.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller determines your future by reading your palm.
meanings.sent4: The doctor determines the cause of the illness with tests.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologist determines the age of the artifact using carbon dating.
